name: HUNGER (itch) (Jerrygood00)
description: Everyone feels hungry on a daily basis. Even if not immediately, they can count on having a meal within hours. They are the ones who suffer the hunger and do not have the option of eating when they are hungry. Both of animals do not get enough calories or essential nutrients to survive another day. They are the ones who are hungry have an ongoing problem with getting food to eat. They have a primary need to feed themselves and their children today and tomorrow. Come and gather as much food as you can and climb to the top of the heaven to receive the precious reward...
